values: To regret something is to wish that it hadn’t happened.
I regret that I was mean to my sister.

To regret is to feel sorrow or disappointment about something that has happened or something that you have done.
Regret refers to a feeling of sadness or disappointment about something that has happened or been done in the past.
n. 遗憾；抱歉；悲叹,vi. 感到后悔；感到抱歉,vt. 后悔；惋惜；哀悼
